mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GUESTBOOK(TOID, TONAME, FROMID, FROMNAME, PROFPIC, COMMENT, REF, STEP, ISVOICE, FILENAME, REGDATE) VALUES(#{toid}, #{toname}, #{fromid}, #{fromname}, #{profpic},#{comment}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(REF),0)+1 FROM GUESTBOOK G), 0, #{isvoice}, #{filename}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, SEQ, TOID, TONAME, FROMID, FROMNAME, PROFPIC, COMMENT, REF, STEP, ISVOICE, FILENAME, REGDATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY REGDATE DESC)AS RNUM, SEQ, TOID, TONAME, FROMID, FROMNAME, PROFPIC, COMMENT, REF, STEP, ISVOICE, FILENAME, REGDATE FROM GUESTBOOK WHERE TOID=#{toid} ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) a WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
